title: Blue Ridge Parkway: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       As one of the most visited units of America's National Park System, the Blue Ridge Parkway always seems to be "in the news."  The road meanders through twenty-nine counties and four US National Forests in western North Carolina and Virginia, and the Parkway traveler contributes tremendously to the economy of both states. Park related news is published here on a frequent basis. New Releases Read current news releases  Social Media  Facebook for all things Blue Ridge Parkway, event updates, photos, news, join the conversation, and more.  Follow @BlueRidgeNPS on Twitter for Parkway alerts and more.  YouTube channel BlueRidgeParkway NPS for videos Instagram @BlueRidgeNPS  Road Closures Keep track of road conditions by checking our real time road closure map. Media Inquiries Contact our Public Information Office at (828) 348-3420
